Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1978...
Had first career hit on 6/19/1979, off Samuel Poitra (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/25/1980, off Arthur Kidwell (PIL)...
Injured on 6/16/1982 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 6-7 weeks...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Traded from Pontiac to Syracuse on 7/30/1985 (Going to SYR: SS C. Rodriguez. Going to PON: 2B M. Pardue, P W. Lavin)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Longport on 7/16/1986...
Injured on 4/28/1987 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Boston (FBA) on 4/19/1988...
